definition: to order sb to start on a journey
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Duplex Pertaining to a transmission system where data may be received and transmitted.
sentences.chinese: 關於傳送系統方面，數據可以接收及傳發。

sentences.english: Full duplex involves transmission or reception simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 全雙向指同時接收及傳發。

sentences.english: Half duplex involves transmission or reception in any one time only.
sentences.chinese: 半雙向指在任何時間的單向傳發或接收。
